name: Dino Skater
description:
Dino Skater — Skate to save the world!

"Things don't get much radder than a dinosaur on a skateboard. Go for it." - Pocket Gamer

“If you like dinosaurs and you like skateboarding, it’s a no brainer!” - Touch Arcade

A meteor has hit the prehistoric earth! Help Dino kickflip, ollie, and grind his way to saving the dinosaurs from extinction! To stop the lava flood you must collect magical fire eggs strewn across Dino's radical jurassic world...OR ELSE.

Use your sick skateboard skills to grind along the backs of fellow dinosaurs while collecting fire eggs to help stop the flow of lava. Snag coins along the way to load up on powerful gear, souped up boards, and upgradeable powerups.

From the creators of Pogo Plumber, Oldify, Fatify, Beardify, and more!

FEATURES:
• Simple controls — tap for speed, release to jump, and hold again to slide along almost any surface!
• Sick tricks — chain your Apatosaurus grinds and T-Rex ollies to top the leaderboards!
• Awesome accessories — Jump higher, skate faster… and look super cool doing it! Get souped up boards and powerful items that will help you save the prehistoric world one skate mission at a time.
